name: Just a card game
description:
Bored of the others card games?

Come on, play with me a little card game I just invented. I tried to make it the most exciting I can, you know, adding just some rules, nothing special.

How to play?

If you don't know how to play, see the rules inside the game, I hope there will be clear enough. But don't waste your time reading this, lets play the game, after all, Its just a card game

Prototype

Right now, the game its just a prototype of what I want to do with it, it was made in 5 hours with placeholders, like the image of the two guys; I cant digital draw, non compuse music, but right now the game its totally playable, so feel free to try it, I hope to add it things in the future. Oh, and Thanks for playing.
